sections.heading: of act.The purpose of the Diploma of High School Equivalency Assistance Act is to provide assistance to institutions which offer high school equivalency programs in order to defray the costs associated with participation in such programs

sections.text:
79-2302.Purpose of act.

The purpose of the Diploma of High School Equivalency Assistance Act is to provide assistance to institutions which offer high school equivalency programs in order to defray the costs associated with participation in such programs.

SourceLaws 2013, LB366, ยง 2.
